comments: Notice the two forward slashes, "//" on the left?
The slashes mean this text is just a comment, not executable code.
We write comments in programs to help other programmers
or ourselves understand our code and ideas and choices we made.
Comments are ignored when the program runs.
For programmers though, they are often worth reading.

Time to play... 
Swap the code lines up and down 
and find the correct sequence of statements to win!
